dataList.name: Interloper
dataList.desc: When an Identity with Interloper is defeated, move to a different Identity without Interloper.

dataList.name: Plugged In
dataList.desc:
Turn End:
- Max 3
- At 3, become Staggered next turn.
- At 3, consume all Charge on self.

dataList.name: Anti-Ovine Grounding Plug
dataList.desc:
- Max 1
- When a unit under this effect wins a Clash against the 'Grounding Refusal' Skill, inflict 1 Plugged In against the target
- Halve the Charge Count on the target
- Expires next turn

dataList.name: Gathering Lightning Cloud
dataList.desc:
- Max 5
- At 1 value, use a powerful Skill.
- Reduced by 1 at Turn End. Gain 1 value when Staggered

dataList.name: Bandages of the King in Binds
dataList.desc:
When defeated, inflict 2 Sinking Potency and 1 Count against all enemies.
Apply Bandages of the King in Binds against the target that defeated this unit. If the said target already has that effect, or if the said target does not exist, apply it to a random enemy without that effect

dataList.name: Moment of Audience
dataList.desc:
Gain Atk Weight equal to the value to all of this unit's Attack Skills. (max 2)
Clash Lose: Gain 1 Fragile next turn

dataList.name: Refracted Determination
dataList.desc: Halve the amount of SP lost when an ally is defeated as per the Identity's 'Base factors decreasing Sanity(SP)'. (rounded down)

dataList.name: Peccatulum Invidiae?
dataList.desc:
- Damage Dealt +15%
- Damage Taken -15%
- Units with this effect are marked by Peccatulum Invidiae? aura

dataList.name: Grand Welcome
dataList.desc: After Attack: if the target is Staggered or defeated, gain +1 Pride E.G.O resource and +1 E.G.O resource for 1 other random Affinity (3 times per turn)

dataList.name: Poised Showdown
dataList.desc: Wave Start: Gain 4 Poise Potency and Count.

dataList.name: Resilient Determination
dataList.desc: Does not lose SP upon ally defeat.
